item.title: Gecko by Google: Pioneering the Next Generation of Text Embedding Models
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Welcome to the world of text embeddings where text is converted into numbers! This world has recently been turned around by the distillation of large language models (LLMs) into efficient and compact forms. Google’s latest innovation, Gecko, is the lastest advancement in this technology, revolutionizing the way we handle textual data. This article explores […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction Welcome to the world of text embeddings where text is converted into numbers! This world has recently been turned around by the distillation of large language models (LLMs) into efficient and compact forms. Google’s latest innovation, Gecko, is the lastest advancement in this technology, revolutionizing the way we handle textual data. This article explores […]

The post Gecko by Google: Pioneering the Next Generation of Text Embedding Models appeared first on Analytics Vidhya.

item.title: From GPT-4 to Llama 3 LMSYS Chatbot Arena Ranks Top LLMs
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Every week, new and more advanced Large Language Models (LLMs) are released, each claiming to be better than the last. But how can we keep up with all these new developments? The answer is the LMSYS Chatbot Arena. The LMSYS Chatbot Arena is an innovative platform created by the Large Model Systems Organization, a […]
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Flask Application Dockerization: Creating a Docker Image
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction In the fast-paced software development industry, mastering robust application management and smooth deployment is crucial. Docker, a game-changing technology, has revolutionized software distribution, running, and bundles by separating applications from infrastructure, enabling quick software delivery. It improves portability, scalability, and workflow optimization, making it a standard component in current development practices. This article aims […]
item.content:encoded:
Introduction In the fast-paced software development industry, mastering robust application management and smooth deployment is crucial. Docker, a game-changing technology, has revolutionized software distribution, running, and bundles by separating applications from infrastructure, enabling quick software delivery. It improves portability, scalability, and workflow optimization, making it a standard component in current development practices. This article aims […]

item.title: Implementing Query2Model: Simplifying Machine Learning
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction Embark on an exciting journey into the world of effortless machine learning with “Query2Model”! This innovative blog introduces a user-friendly interface where complex tasks are simplified into plain language queries. Explore the fusion of natural language processing and advanced AI models, transforming intricate tasks into straightforward conversations. Join us as we delve into the […]

item.title: Microsoft Phi 3 Mini: The Tiny Model That Runs on Your Phone
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction In the field of artificial intelligence (AI), there’s always been a belief that bigger is better. But Microsoft has just shaken things up with their latest creation, Phi-3-mini. It’s a small AI model that’s turning heads by showing that size isn’t everything. Despite being much smaller than its counterparts, Phi-3-mini can hold its own […]

item.title: Top 20+ RAG Interview Questions
item.dc:creator: ross
item.description: Introduction RAG has been a game-changer in the developing fields of GenAI, Data Science, and AI. Because RAG models let machines produce more accurate, coherent, and consistent language with facts, they transform how humans engage with technology. RAG is bringing the idea of robots that can write unique content, engrossing product descriptions, and news pieces to life. […]
item.content:encoded:

Because RAG models let machines produce more accurate, coherent, and consistent language with facts, they transform how humans engage with technology. RAG is bringing the idea of robots that can write unique content, engrossing product descriptions, and news pieces to life. […]
